name: Amazing Princess Match 3
description:
Enjoy matching adorable princess pets, clothes and jewels and climb the tower!
Amazing Princess Match 3 entertains both young and old through clever puzzles oozing with charm and style!

- MATCH princess clothes and jewels! Lovely rings, diamonds and more!
- FIND the lost kittens!
- POWERFUL spells and magical potions to use!
- ENJOY playing with friends!

INSTALL and enjoy matching today!
